posts.text:
Benq GW2760HS skjár til sölu.
Featuring ultra-high 3000:1 native contrast, 20M:1 dynamic contrast ratio, and true 8-bit panel performance with deep blacks and minimized light leakage, this VA LED monitor refreshes your view with truly fantastic colors and details.
16:9 Full HD skjár til sölu.
Frekar upplýsingar: 
http://www.benq.com/product/monitor/GW2760/
Keyptur af heimkaup, 03.01.2014
Verð: Uppboð. Byrjar í 20.000 kr.
Uppboð endar 31. Janúar
Buy it now verð: 30.000 kr
